article.title: U.S. Navy Modifies Advanced Hawkeye Contract
article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems Corporation, Bethpage, New York, is being awarded a $10,482,257 modification to a previously awarded fixed-price-incentive-firm target contract (N00019-13-C-9999) for product support and engineering investigations in support of the full rate production Lot 2 E-2D Advanced Hawkeye Program. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
